#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#define MAX 1000000
#define FOR(i,m,n) for(i=m;i<=n;i++)

using namespace std;

long int a,num[MAX+10],cur[MAX+10],cur_num[MAX+10],length=1;

void new_length_binary_search(long int indx)
{
    long int temp,new_indx;
    temp=num[indx];
    new_indx=upper_bound(cur_num+1,cur_num+length+1,temp)- cur_num;
    cur[new_indx]=indx;
    cur_num[new_indx]=num[indx];
    if(new_indx >length) length=new_indx;
}

int main()
{
    long int i,n,cur_n,ans;
    cur_n=ans=a=0;

    memset(num,0,sizeof(num));scanf("%ld",&n);

    FOR(i,1,n)
    {
        scanf("%ld",&a);
        a-=i;
        if(a>=0)
        { cur_n++; num[cur_n]=a;}
        else ans++;
    }

    cur[1]=1; cur_num[1]=0;

    FOR(i,1,cur_n)
        new_length_binary_search(i);

    ans+=cur_n+1-length;

    printf("%ld",ans);

    return 0;
}
